system.description:
You were once the squire, the tag-a-long. You were nobody. But now? Now you are somebody, and nobody can deny your worth. They cannot succeed without you anymore.

REQUIREMENTS

To become the Knight, you must have 3 or more Bonds with at least two other players.

The Knight starts with You Have My Shield.

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.knight.Item.asX1BXX8DgXdWdBr]{YOU HAVE MY SHIELD}

CUSTOM MOVES

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.knight.Item.xZq1IOkDMewbnGau]{A PROPER KNIGHT}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.knight.Item.69B3NhU3e2dFZJEY]{ENDLESS DETERMINATION}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.knight.Item.0SombjTUkPiCQstc]{FULL METAL}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.knight.Item.nL7Gz4ZgQx02wZZD]{WAR HORSE}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.knight.Item.yDTEm7bECSYBpuMb]{WE NEED YOUR HELP!}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.knight.Item.RJoeomyxRkRA4uEz]{YOU MUST KEEP GOING!}

advancements.name: Take the Squire's Core Moves (Fast Friends, It's Dangerous To Go Alone, and Please, Just Listen). If you already have them, instead increase one of your stats by +1, to a maximum of +3.
